item.title: LIVE: 15 dead, dozens injured as pickup plows into crowd in New Orleans: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: 15 dead in New Orleans truck attack; suspect ID'd as US citizen, sources say
item.description: Fifteen people were killed and dozens injured when a pickup truck plowed into a crowd on Bourbon Street in New Orleans.

item.title: Biden says reaction to New Orleans attack was 'anger and frustration'
item.description: President Biden said there is "no justification" for the "horrific" attack early New Year's Day in New Orleans that left at least 10 people dead and d...

item.title: Johnson to meet with Trump at Mar-a-Lago to 'map' strategy ahead of speakership vote
item.description: House Speaker Mike Johnson is spending New Year's Day with President-elect Donald Trump ahead of a showdown vote later this week to keep his leadershi...

item.title: Ukraine halts pipeline carrying Russian natural gas to Europe, as deal expires
item.description: "We stopped the transit of Russian gas, this is a historic event," Herman Galushchenko, Ukraine's energy minister, said in a statement.
